GlassEngine.name: GLASS ENGINE
GlassEngine.description:
At the start of the turn, gain 1 <c=status>EVADE</c>.
<c=downside>Breaks if you take hull damage.</c>

GlassShield.name: GLASS SHIELD
GlassShield.description:
At the start of the turn, gain 1 <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c>.
<c=downside>Breaks if you take hull damage.</c>

Painter.name: PAINTER'S PALETTE
Painter.description: When you play a non-colorless card, gain a <c=status>PIGMENT</c> of that color, up to three.

Prism.name: COLORFUL CRYSTAL
Prism.description: Add 1 extra card reward, it's always from characters not in your crew.

Printer.name: CARD PRINTER
Printer.description: At combat start, add a <c=card>Blank Card</c> to your hand.

PingPong.name: PING PONG ARMOR
PingPong.description: On pickup, your <c=part>cannon</c> gains <c=parttrait>armor</c>. When ANY <c=parttrait>armored</c> part is hit, the hit then bounces randomly back to the attacker.

Recycler.name: RECYCLING PROTOCOL
Recycler.description: The first card you play each turn is placed back on top of your draw pile.

Pigment.name: PIGMENT
Pigment.description: Add an additional effect to the next colorless card you play, based on the pigment's <c=peri>C</c><c=dizzy>O</c><c=riggs>L</c><c=eunice>O</c><c=goat>R</c>.
Pigment.peri:
<c=peri>PERI PIGMENT</c>
Your next colorless card also attacks <c=value>{0}</c> times for 0 damage.
Pigment.dizzy:
<c=dizzy>DIZZY PIGMENT</c>
Your next colorless card also grants you <c=value>{0}</c> <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c>.
Pigment.riggs:
<c=riggs>RIGGS PIGMENT</c>
Your next colorless card also moves you randomly by <c=value>{0}</c> space.
Pigment.drake:
<c=eunice>DRAKE PIGMENT</c>
Your next colorless card also applies <c=value>{0}</c> <c=heat>heat</c> to the enemy.
Pigment.max:
<c=hacker>MAX PIGMENT</c>
Your next colorless card also draws <c=value>{0}</c> cards.
Pigment.isaac:
<c=goat>ISAAC PIGMENT</c>
Your next colorless card also grants you <c=value>{0}</c> droneshift.
Pigment.books:
<c=shard>BOOKS PIGMENT</c>
Your next colorless card also grants you <c=value>{0}</c> <c=status>SHARD</c>.
Pigment.noone:
<c=afafaf>UNKNOWN PIGMENT</c>
Your next colorless card also grants you <c=value>{0}</c> <c=status>ENERGY FRAGMENT</c>.

Ramm.name: RAM
Ramm.description: Rapidly ram into the enemy ship, destroying any midrow object in your path.

Rail.name: Iron Express
Rail.description: A clunky ship featuring a rail mounted cannon, also capable of acting as a shield by rotating on its axis.

ElectricCharge.name: ELECTRIC CHARGE
ElectricCharge.description:
Add {0} damage to your next attack card.
<c=downside>Decreases by 1 when hit.</c>

BlankCard.name: Blank Card
BlankCard.description: Create a perm copy of a card in your hand, then <c=cardtrait>exhaust</c> it.
